roleset.name: accost someone in order to beg

role.descr: money, item panhandler is begging for from arg 1

example.name: Ranting example
example.text: If someone close to you dies in one silly-ass war for the juice 0 *T*-1 to run your SUV, or you find yourself sitting in a homeless shelter, or standing on a streetcorner and panhandling for change from strangers who couldn't give two shits for you, because the fat slobs who run your company decided to outsource your job to people who will work twice as long and hard as you do for a tenth the pay, your credit rating is in negative numbers and your address is "No Fixed Address"...
example.arg: from strangers who couldn't give two shits for you
because the fat slobs who run your company decided to outsource your job...
